price: Wanda ya kasance yanã fãtan gamuwa da Alah to lalle ajalin Allah mai zuwa ne, kuma (Allah) Shĩ ne Mai ji, Masani.
arabic: مَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ لِقَآءَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ لَأٓتٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: man kāna yarjū liqāa al-lahi fa-inna ajala al-lahi laātin wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
